definition: mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: Now, there are some immediate bad explanations for this.
sentences.chinese: 馬上就有人提出一些錯漏百出的解釋。

sentences.english: Done in a hurry, his homework was full of mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 由於完成得很匆忙，他的作業錯漏百出。

sentences.english: I might go into the theater to see the reaction of the audience, or to see if the subtitles were correct.
sentences.chinese: 我可能會入坐看觀衆反應，或是看看字幕有沒有錯漏。

sentences.english: Objective To provide a reference for incidence of errors in emergency pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲降低急診處方錯漏事件發生率提供借鑑。

sentences.english: Jarvis points out that the earliest books were riddled with errors.
sentences.chinese: 賈維斯指出，最早期的書籍錯漏百出。

sentences.english: To avoid any typing mistake when preparing the badge, please TYPE or write in BLOCK LETTER.
sentences.chinese: 爲避免錯漏，請清楚打印或以正楷填寫。

sentences.english: I declare that all information stated in this form is accurate and complete.
sentences.chinese: 本人聲明此表格內所填寫的資料均屬真實，並無錯漏。

sentences.english: INVOICE SHOWING "E. AND O. E." SHOULD BE DELETED.
sentences.chinese: 發票顯示的“錯漏當查”應刪去。

sentences.english: Ep680 - Kexin still misses her late father very much. She performs badly at work.
sentences.chinese: 可欣仍放不下對亡父四川的思念，工作錯漏百出。
